snippet: The university will research and analyze 249 pieces of black-glazed pottery, performing tests that the Roman institution can not afford on its own.
abstract: University of Missouri students will have opportunity to study ancient artifacts through pilot program with Capitoline Museums in Rome.
lead_paragraph: The university will research and analyze 249 pieces of black-glazed pottery, performing tests that the Roman institution can not afford on its own.

headline.main: Capitoline Museums in Rome to Join With University of Missouri to Catalog Artifacts
headline.print_headline: Some Help From Missouri for Roman Museums
